src/kinect/lib/geninits.py

00001 #!/usr/bin/python
00002 
00003 #   libfreenect - an open source Kinect driver
00004 #
00005 # Copyright (C) 2010  Hector Martin "marcan" <hector@marcansoft.com>
00006 #
00007 # This code is licensed to you under the terms of the GNU GPL, version 2 or version 3;
00008 # see:
00009 #  http://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/gpl-2.0.txt
00010 #  http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt
00011 
00012 import struct, sys
00013 
00014 fd = open(sys.argv[2], "w")
00015 
00016 count = 0;
00017 
00018 print >>fd, '#include "freenect_internal.h"'
00019 print >>fd
00020 print >>fd, "const struct caminit inits[] = {"
00021 for line in open(sys.argv[1]):
00022         line = line.replace("\n","").replace("\r","")
00023         if line == "":
00024                 continue
00025         if line[0] == "#":
00026                 continue
00027         cmd,tag,cdata,rdata = line.split(",")
00028         cmd = int(cmd,16)
00029         tag = int(tag,16)
00030 
00031         cdata = cdata.decode('hex')
00032         rdata = rdata.decode('hex')
00033 
00034         hcdata = ", ".join(["0x%02x"%ord(x) for x in cdata])
00035         hrdata = ", ".join(["0x%02x"%ord(x) for x in rdata])
00036 
00037         print >>fd, "\t{"
00038         print >>fd, "\t\t0x%02x, 0x%04x, %d, %d,"%(cmd, tag, len(cdata), len(rdata))
00039         print >>fd, "\t\t{%s},"%hcdata
00040         print >>fd, "\t\t{%s},"%hrdata
00041         print >>fd, "\t},"
00042         count += 1
00043 print >>fd, "};"
00044 print >>fd
00045 print >>fd, "const int num_inits = %d;"%count;
00046 print >>fd
